activities2 <- read.csv(URLencode(url2), as.is=T,na.strings="")

ftsflow2020 <- get_FTS(url = "https://api.hpc.tools",
                              ext = "/v1/public/fts/flow?",
                              year = "year=2020")
#> successful API Query
ftsflow2019 <- get_FTS(url = "https://api.hpc.tools",
                              ext = "/v1/public/fts/flow?",
                              year = "year=2019")
#> successful API Query
names(ftsflow2020)
